'Can't wait for Kamala to be president': Willie Brown says he will put every nickel on...
content: ​“I was a part of every campaign that she’s ever been involved in, supported her religiously and will still do so, and I am just looking forward for the next 89 days. I just can’t wait to get her in as president,” Kamala Harris' ex-boyfriend Willie Brown said reacting to Donald Trump's anecdote that Willie Brown was not a fan of Kamala Harris at that time and told terrible things about Kamala.

title: Barron Trump's 'best friend' says Donald asked him 5 times if...
content: ​A social media influencer Bo Loudon who claimed to be Barron Trump's best friend posted several never-seen-before photographs from former president Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago Club resident in Florida and proclaimed that Gen Z stands with 'rightful president' Trump. The photos were probably taken when Trump sat for a livestream with influencer Adin Ross.
summary: ​A social media influencer Bo Loudon who claimed to be Barron Trump's best friend posted several never-seen-before photographs from former president Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago Club resident in Florida and proclaimed that Gen Z stands with 'rightful president' Trump. The photos were probably taken when Trump sat for a livestream with influencer Adin Ross.

title: 'Trump took a break from taking a break to put some pants': Harris campaign trolls 'meltdown'
content: Donald Trump addressed an hour long press conference yesterday at his home berating Kamala Harris and Tim Walz. But what followed was a statement from the Harris-Walz campaign which trolled Trump and called it a 'very good, very normal' press conference -- sarcastically. "Donald Trump took a break from taking a break to put on some pants and host a press conference public meltdown," the campaign release said including the strikethrough.
summary: Donald Trump addressed an hour long press conference yesterday at his home berating Kamala Harris and Tim Walz. But what followed was a statement from the Harris-Walz campaign which trolled Trump and called it a 'very good, very normal' press conference -- sarcastically. "Donald Trump took a break from taking a break to put on some pants and host a press conference public meltdown," the campaign release said including the strikethrough.

title: Kamala Harris & Tim Walz camouflage hat raises $1 million: Here's how
Japan's Kishida cancels Asia trip after scientists urge preparations for a possible 'megaquake'
content: Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida canceled a trip to Central Asia to manage the government's response to a potential 'megaquake' off Japan's southern coast. The Japan Meteorological Agency issued its first 'megaquake advisory' following a 7.1 magnitude quake near Kyushu. Officials urged heightened caution for a week and advised local governments to review disaster plans.
summary: Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida canceled a trip to Central Asia to manage the government's response to a potential 'megaquake' off Japan's southern coast. The Japan Meteorological Agency issued its first 'megaquake advisory' following a 7.1 magnitude quake near Kyushu. Officials urged heightened caution for a week and advised local governments to review disaster plans.

title: 'But did JD Vance see combat? He was in public affairs': CNN anchor slammed
content: "Brianna this is disgusting, and you and your entire network should be ashamed of yourselves. When I got the call to go to Iraq, I went. Tim Walz said he carried a gun in a war. Did he? No. It was a lie," JD Vance posted on X slamming the CNN anchor who questioned whether JD Vance, as a combat correspondent in the army, was even in a combat.
summary: "Brianna this is disgusting, and you and your entire network should be ashamed of yourselves. When I got the call to go to Iraq, I went. Tim Walz said he carried a gun in a war. Did he? No. It was a lie," JD Vance posted on X slamming the CNN anchor who questioned whether JD Vance, as a combat correspondent in the army, was even in a combat.

title: Russia declares emergency in Kursk region as Ukraine launches mega attack
content: Russia declared a federal-level emergency in the Kursk region after a substantial incursion from Ukraine, mobilizing reinforcements to counter the attack. This incident followed Ukrainian troops crossing the border, representing Kyiv's largest attack on Russian soil since the war's onset. Concurrently, a Russian missile strike on a Ukrainian shopping mall resulted in multiple casualties.
summary: Russia declared a federal-level emergency in the Kursk region after a substantial incursion from Ukraine, mobilizing reinforcements to counter the attack. This incident followed Ukrainian troops crossing the border, representing Kyiv's largest attack on Russian soil since the war's onset. Concurrently, a Russian missile strike on a Ukrainian shopping mall resulted in multiple casualties.

title: 'Russia will be held accountable': Zelenskyy vows retaliation after Russian strike on supermarket kills 10, injures 35
'Listen...': Tim Walz's 'stolen valor' controversy gets Kamala Harris' reaction
content: Tim Walz served 24 years in various units and jobs in the Army National Guard. He retired from service in May 2005 when he was up for his congressional bid. In August 2005, the unit that Walz was serving was asked to mobilize and in March 2006, it was deployed to Iraq. There is no evidence that Walz retired from the service to avoid deployment.
summary: Tim Walz served 24 years in various units and jobs in the Army National Guard. He retired from service in May 2005 when he was up for his congressional bid. In August 2005, the unit that Walz was serving was asked to mobilize and in March 2006, it was deployed to Iraq. There is no evidence that Walz retired from the service to avoid deployment.

title: Willie Brown says Kamala Harris was a good friend, can't think in negative way
content: Donald Trump in his press conference yesterday said he knows Kamala Harris' ex-boyfriend Willie Brown and that they had an emergency experience during a helicopter ride and that Brown told terrible things about Kamala Harris. Now Willie Brown, the former San Francisco mayor, completely denied everything calling whatever Trump said his figment of imagination.
summary: Donald Trump in his press conference yesterday said he knows Kamala Harris' ex-boyfriend Willie Brown and that they had an emergency experience during a helicopter ride and that Brown told terrible things about Kamala Harris. Now Willie Brown, the former San Francisco mayor, completely denied everything calling whatever Trump said his figment of imagination.

title: Covid-19 drops to 10th leading cause of death in US as overall mortality declines
content: The CDC reported that Covid-19 fell to the 10th leading cause of death in the US in 2023, down from third at the pandemic’s peak. Death rates decreased across all age groups and racial demographics. Heart disease, cancer, and injuries, including gun-related deaths and drug overdoses, emerged as the top causes of death in 2023.
summary: The CDC reported that Covid-19 fell to the 10th leading cause of death in the US in 2023, down from third at the pandemic’s peak. Death rates decreased across all age groups and racial demographics. Heart disease, cancer, and injuries, including gun-related deaths and drug overdoses, emerged as the top causes of death in 2023.

title: Samantha Murphy murder case delayed over 'unprecedented' amount of evidence against accused
content: Patrick Orren Stephenson will remain in custody for another three months due to the large amount of evidence against him in the case of Samantha Murphy's murder. Despite opposition from his lawyer, the court granted an extension. Murphy, a mother of three, was reported missing on February 4 in Mount Clear. Stephenson also faces charges related to a previous crash.
summary: Patrick Orren Stephenson will remain in custody for another three months due to the large amount of evidence against him in the case of Samantha Murphy's murder. Despite opposition from his lawyer, the court granted an extension. Murphy, a mother of three, was reported missing on February 4 in Mount Clear. Stephenson also faces charges related to a previous crash.

title: Nevada man charged with hate crime after 'hanging tree' comment at car show
content: Three individuals were arrested in Nevada after a confrontation with a Black man collecting signatures, during which a 'hanging tree' was mentioned. Gary Miller, 74, his wife, and daughter face multiple misdemeanor charges. The incident, recorded during a Virginia City car show, led to backlash. Nevada Attorney General Aaron Ford praised the arrests.
summary: Three individuals were arrested in Nevada after a confrontation with a Black man collecting signatures, during which a 'hanging tree' was mentioned. Gary Miller, 74, his wife, and daughter face multiple misdemeanor charges. The incident, recorded during a Virginia City car show, led to backlash. Nevada Attorney General Aaron Ford praised the arrests.

title: Huge California wildfire chews through timber in very hot and dry weather
content: California's largest wildfire of the year, the Park Fire, grew rapidly due to hot and dry weather, burning over 660 square miles since July 24. Containment remained at 34%, and authorities focused on curtailing spot fires. A man was arrested for allegedly starting the fire, which destroyed hundreds of structures.
summary: California's largest wildfire of the year, the Park Fire, grew rapidly due to hot and dry weather, burning over 660 square miles since July 24. Containment remained at 34%, and authorities focused on curtailing spot fires. A man was arrested for allegedly starting the fire, which destroyed hundreds of structures.

title: 'Meghan Markle allegedly screaming after CBS interview': Duchess of Sussex faces fresh controversy over tense TV appearance with Prince Harry
content: After their recent interview, Meghan Markle reportedly had a 'meltdown,' being very upset and angry about unexpected questions regarding her suicidal thoughts. Experts noted visible tension between Meghan and Prince Harry, describing the interview as a 'car crash' due to their awkward dynamics and Meghan's frustration with the producers and her husband's responses.
summary: After their recent interview, Meghan Markle reportedly had a 'meltdown,' being very upset and angry about unexpected questions regarding her suicidal thoughts. Experts noted visible tension between Meghan and Prince Harry, describing the interview as a 'car crash' due to their awkward dynamics and Meghan's frustration with the producers and her husband's responses.

title: The world's most dangerous volcanoes: Waiting for the next eruption
content: The article investigates the world's most dangerous volcanoes, highlighting their historical eruptions and current threats. Notable mentions include Mount Vesuvius, Mount St. Helens, and Mount Merapi, among others. Each poses significant risks to nearby populations, with ongoing monitoring due to their potential for future eruptions

title: 'JD Vance is not authentic': Former White house press secretary Jen Psaki slams Republican US VP nominee saying 'voters are not dumb'
content: Jen Psaki criticized Republican VP nominee JD Vance for inauthenticity, noting his shift to support Donald Trump. Psaki emphasized Vance's inconsistency, stating voters are smart enough to notice. Recently, Vance's attempt to confront Kamala Harris further highlighted his campaign tactics. Trump announced Vance as his VP pick in July via Truth Social.
summary: Jen Psaki criticized Republican VP nominee JD Vance for inauthenticity, noting his shift to support Donald Trump. Psaki emphasized Vance's inconsistency, stating voters are smart enough to notice. Recently, Vance's attempt to confront Kamala Harris further highlighted his campaign tactics. Trump announced Vance as his VP pick in July via Truth Social.
